headline: Looking for Conservative Cofounder?
description:
While reaching across the political aisle is great, it's also great to be aligned with your cofounder. Being a conservative feels like being an outcast in startupland... it feels like there are so few of us.

If you are interested in (1) matching with a conservative cofounder or (2) being part of a conservative cofounder community with which to ideate etc, please sign up on this super short google form :)

https://forms.gle/CtZVnSVpYXr8NnNv6

Thanks!
headline_zh-Hans: 寻找保守的联合创始人？
headline_zh-Hant: 尋找保守的聯合創始人？
description_zh-Hans:
虽然跨越政治通道是件好事，但与你的联合创始人保持一致也是件好事。

如果你对(1)与保守的联合创始人相匹配或(2)成为保守的联合创始人社区的一部分并与之进行思想交流等感兴趣，请在这个超短的谷歌表格上注册：

https://forms.gle/CtZVnSVpYXr8NnNv6

谢谢!
description_zh-Hant:
雖然跨越政治通道是件好事，但與你的聯合創始人保持一致也是件好事。

如果你對(1)與保守的聯合創始人相匹配或(2)成為保守的聯合創始人社區的一部分並與之進行思想交流等感興趣，請在這個超短的谷歌表格上註冊：

https://forms.gle/CtZVnSVpYXr8NnNv6

謝謝!
